website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive batting tee is a suitable choice for beginners, but probably won't hold up well over time.
pros: Offers adjustable height for players of various sizes
Price falls on the lower end of the spectrum
cons: Not the most durable option, so it's not a good choice for experienced players

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 5 year old to practice his swing, but the tee split on the first use after about 20 hits. It’s made of harder plastic so it’s not as flexible as other tees. The base does move well. The worst part is the return process. Amazon doesn’t handle the return and you have to go through Franklin and pay all the shipping-which is about the cost of a new tee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality and materials
customer_reviews.text: The American consumer often refers to things that are made with very poor quality and materials as being from China. This is one of the most disappointing products we have ever seen from Franklin. Extremely poor, thin chincy plastic parts that do not stand up to the job they are intended. Due to the extremely poor quality, the entire item does not function as described and pictured. A child would have to hit the ball exactly right for the junky item to not fly all over the place and function as pictured in the video. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I guess this one is designed for MLB pros who never touch the ball holder. Because my boys wanted to learn and after about two dozen hits, the holder broke into two pieces. Plus, it was leaning to one side after the first couple of hits, hitting the ball. The old school T ball holders held up for years. This one lasted an hour. Horrible return policy. Have to contact the mfg, and good luck during this virus. So, we are SOL on this item. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: Great product but could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product overall but the part that you tee up the ball should be made of material that can absorb shock because after couple of weeks of use by my 8 years old son the tip was shattered. I would recommend that you wrap the tee with duct tape to prevent from shattering before use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Yu

customer_reviews.title: Shattrred like glass
customer_reviews.text: Well first swing and my son shattered the red plastic holder. Shattered it....first swing. The rest of it works well. Lol. It doesn't tip...and it was missing a pin...for height. I turned the post inside to make it really stiff and it's fine up and down. But come on......no height pin and the holder shatters. I would of wrapped it in duct tape...if they would of warned me. Jeees.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Cicchiello

customer_reviews.title: The tee split at the top within 1 month of ...
customer_reviews.text: The tee split at the top within 1 month of use and now it has completely separated and it's only been in use for 2 months. My kids are experienced softball players and let a friend who was learning how to bat hit off the tee and it all went to bell from there. Even duct tape couldn't save the tee from the kids
customer_reviews.author: Quanda

customer_reviews.title: Decent find
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality item, didn’t find that it worked well without something to weight added to the base. Better options for the price. Good idea just not practical with the light weight material.
customer_reviews.author: david gravener

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the pieces didn't line up so we had to force it together. But overall has great spring. Adjusting could be a bit easier but I think that is part of what majes it sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Susan Krysztoforski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands of tees and this one really holds up well. It’s study and works well. Kids practice quite a bit and this works nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this as a Christmas present for my 5 year old...had some nice weather this weekend and finally took it out of the box...put it together and in less than 10 minutes the tee broke into pieces where the ball is placed and is unusable...complete junk...i will get photos if requested
customer_reviews.author: phh3

customer_reviews.title: Not bad .
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Came on time . Great to practice with , just be carful if you hit hard step back cause it swings back and forth . Will hit you in the wrong places lol
customer_reviews.author: Sheytoon

customer_reviews.title: good tall stand
customer_reviews.text: Kids are having a lot of fun with it. They love that it Springs back, and it certainly lasted a lot longer than any other baseball stands that we've had
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there are better batting tee's on the market but for the money spent this is a good durable batting tee. Does not fall over as easily as some we have purchased in the past. I do not regret purchasing and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kramp-e 57

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and made.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Stands up to my grandson's enthusiasm. Love the flexibility. Weighted correctly so it remains standing in use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger players
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for taller middle school kids. Definitely great for younger to average age preteens and early teens.
customer_reviews.author: Nychelle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works great
customer_reviews.text: Durable and works great. Just don’t step on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: C Tokunaga

customer_reviews.title: adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old grandson. It is real nice because you can adjust the height as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: dmc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: excellent t-ball stand - does not tip over....my grandson more amazed with the spring bottom stand than hitting the ball!
customer_reviews.author: grandma W

customer_reviews.title: Great tee
customer_reviews.text: Tee works great. We use an anchor in the front hole to also keep it standing but it works like a charm. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ajcd

customer_reviews.title: AMazing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is using this with my son and daughter and raves that this is the best tee EVER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Lots of family fun in the backyard with it. Easy to adjust for all ages. Mama and papa too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Joy Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! No more having to set the tee back up
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was sick of the plain batting tees flipping over when hit but this is perfect at a good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great tee!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Order different one last wee that kept falling apart as my boy played made it frustrating for the both of us. Order this one and it is a well build product and I would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: We had another T that if my son would make contact with the T the entire thing would topple. This one is great because for him because the hinge is at the plate so it doesn't topple. However if my 12 year old nephew used this and hit the T I think it would be history pretty quick. For bigger kids you need to spend the bigger bucks. For T ball and up to 7 or 8 maybe this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Reldnam

customer_reviews.title: Spring swing base damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived and was damaged. Item arrived broken in pieces
customer_reviews.author: CT mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped to sharpen my son’s batting skills a great deal. Very sturdy and well made. 👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Nakea Kerby

customer_reviews.title: Many uses and still Great.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Bought this for T-Ball. Have used it many time now!! Bottom part is made out of pcp. It has been hit many times and is fine. But I did buy this for T-BALL!! Top red part is rubber. Over all happy with it!.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Helps Kids Hit The Ball, Durable
customer_reviews.text: This tee seems to be pretty durable. It doesn't fall over unless the kids completely miss the ball and hit it in the middle of the tee. It is helping our son and daughter learn how to hit a baseball, so it is serving its purpose. I wish it went lower, as it is a little tall for our daughter, but otherwise a good product. Decent price too.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Would buy and recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son! I have since used it for his entire team and it is so amazing. It doesn’t tip if the boys hit it. It’s so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all! Broke after about 10 minutes of my 12 year old daughter hitting. And she only hit tee twice before it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red tip for holding baseball was cracked when we opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Red tip for holding baseball was cracked when we opened the package. Unable to use product due to crack as the red plastic broke when putting it in place due to the crack.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Endicott

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This tee is a piece of junk. Don't buy it. If my son hit slightly under the tee, the whole stand would fly out of the base and it would never secure in tightly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shar1Scan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worried about the quality because of the price but this tee works great for my 3 year old who is just learning. He's hit the tee a few times and it hasn't tipped over at all, very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good tee
customer_reviews.text: Great tee for the money. Adjusts to accomodate kids (and some adults!) of varying heights.Sturdy too, doesn't knock over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nate's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great and as advertised. I only rated 4 stars because the red cup/ball holder bends a little too easy and are having to straighten it out fairly often. Originally bought for my daughter to use for softball, my son is also using it to better his swing technique too. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra V.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy product.
customer_reviews.text: The first time my ten year old daughter swung, she hit the tee rather than the ball and the button that adjusts the height broke off. The tee works, but we can’t adjust it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, frustration free t-stand.
customer_reviews.text: Only used with Nerf bat, do haven’t had the top issue. Love how it doesn’t fall over.
customer_reviews.author: m.kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a week after using the tee it no longer stands up straight to hold a ball. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 1 week
customer_reviews.text: The Tee broke in the first week, just like so many other people have indicated. It still works but it's about 12 inches too short now...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it. If the kids ares older 8 then ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. If the kids ares older 8 then will likely not last as long but for the younger T-Ball players works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: T ball fun
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive (which is always nice) but will do the job. Not as durable as some of the more expensive options so probably more suited to younger children who are just learning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Great tee.
customer_reviews.text: Great tee... Perfect for my 4 year old and his older cousins as well, I have even hit off it and it is holding up great. Can not beat for the price
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our tee ball team to practice with. It's good for younger kids, but older kids can be a little rough on it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C 424

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built tee my 4 yr old son got a lot of use out of it this year and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect batting tee
customer_reviews.text: Great for teaching my son to hit the ball "No pressure" Does a great job standing still and holding a ball, much better than sacrificing his little sister!
customer_reviews.author: Amberrose

customer_reviews.title: Was not real thrilled with this product. Mainly plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not real thrilled with this product. Mainly plastic. Spend a couple bucks more and get one made of rubber. I would not have purchased if I had realized it was all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler to learn and grow with it. Great quality, style and design.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meckley

customer_reviews.title: MY GRANDKIDS LOVE ME!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this batting tee is it doesn't fall over like the light weight ones do. This one is very heavy and sturdy and works wonderfully...if not abused!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Worley

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this tee has a movable base to stop the tee top from breaking.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Red part warps easily.  Don't store in heat or on it's side.
customer_reviews.text: It works better without the red thing.... which tend to warp and bend awkwardly if stored even slightly incorrectly or exposed to heat. I paid a little over $5, so it was worth it, but I wouldn't suggest paying full price for this thing. Also, we store it indoors! I would be afraid of the state of this thing if it were left in the storage building. The heat it was exposed to was in the car on a trip to the park. That's IT. Imagine leaving it outside all summer. >.<
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction. Just right for starting out. Love the recoil.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light weight, and durable. Will get tons of use out of this. Quick to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Merbert104

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old T-Ball son loves this! Wish I would have bought more for birthday party gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product which costs less than half from local store. No tipping, easy to use, heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: teea

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Broke during first use. The plastic button that allows it to adjust height broke on the 8th swing.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as expected.
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN SOME BATTING TEES, BUT HAS SOME CONS. NO WAY TO STABILIZE THE PLATE. IF YOU HIT THE TEE STEM IT COMES OUT OF THE BASE. USED IT SO FAR ABOUT FIVE TIMES AND IS HOLDING UP, HOWEVER, I SEE IT EVENTUALLY BREAKING. NOT AS DURABLE AS I EXPECTED. FOR THE PRICE I GUESS IT IS OKAY.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great t-ball starter!
customer_reviews.text: I remember with my first son when I had to set the T up after every at bat. Not anymore, this is such a nice convenience. The stem and base seem durable. Very large height adjustable range. Only reason why I didn't put 5 stars is because it would be nice to have a friction base if using on cement. The base will slide around when my son hits and then he has to reposition all over. Not a big deal, but a rubber sole would be a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: J. DeWitz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The T-ball stand was the correct height and easy to use for my grandson. He is able to practice without an adult tossing the ball to him.
customer_reviews.author: The Pressure Cooker

customer_reviews.title: out of the box bad
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it arrived it was falling apart... The weights fell off just taking it out of the box. The glue didn't hold and then my boys used them as "ammo" and i can't find them so it falls over. Almost a complete waste
customer_reviews.author: ssad

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality all plastic with light weight base I'd Keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality all plastic with light weight base I'd Keep looking if your wanting this for some real practice
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Chinese cheap at its best.
customer_reviews.text: It broke on my son's 15th swing. He didn't even hit the tee. Chinese cheap at its best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted and at a great price! Shipping was fast also.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, and the low price makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pin broke that allows the batting tee to adjust to different heights after using just 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect performer
customer_reviews.text: This is everything we were looking for. We are very pleased with this tee. Thanks for making our sons Christmas wishes come true.
customer_reviews.author: Camie Reckers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: its very bad. My son hurt his finger on it. I don't recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cracked after hit with foam bat
customer_reviews.text: This item broke the second swing of a foam bat by my 5 year old son. We were all extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart the first day and if I could I would have opted for one made better. Spend the few bucks extra!
customer_reviews.author: Nuttbugly

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 hitting session
customer_reviews.text: Height adjustment click in the tube broke after only on round of hitting practice with my 6 year old daughter. This with using it at the lowest setting. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This product is not durable. One hit and my son broke it. The plastic is just too thin for any real use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Harley

customer_reviews.title: A great tee
customer_reviews.text: I use this tee with both my children. My oldest has played for a few years where as my youngest is just starting. So the adjustment is awesome. We used it almost every day this summer and it has very little wear. It's a great tee
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports MLB Spring Swing No Tip Batting Tee, Standard Packaging
product_meta.description:
Franklin sports got its start in 1946 as a regional brand of sporting goods products. Irving H. Franklin, who co-founded Franklin sports in 1946 with his brother Sydney Franklin, brought the innovative idea of centering a complete line of products on a single athlete - Joe Namath. Over the years Franklin has affiliated with the best in sports including world class athletes like Sugar Ray Leonard, David Robinson, Dan Marino, Barry Bonds and more.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The MLB® Spring Swing No Tip Batting Tee has an easy snap and twist assembly. Designed to deflect the momentum of the bat to prevent the tee from tipping over. It adjusts from 22" to 24" and has a flexible PVC ball holder. The plate is weighted with steel rod inserts. Great fun for the beginner batter.
feature_bullets: Designed to deflect the momentum of the bat to prevent the tee from tipping
Flexible PVC ball holder for better ball contact
Patented spring mechanism provides a no-hassle continuous practice

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars275 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
